lead_paragraph: A few months after the closing ceremony in Rio de Janeiro, IOC officials have a new tagline for South America's first Olympics: "The most perfect imperfect games."

headline.main: IOC: Rio Olympics Were 'Most Perfect Imperfect Games'
headline.print_headline: IOC: Rio Olympics Were 'Most Perfect Imperfect Games'
